summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2809 for the improvement of Forty-fourth Avenue South and Forty-fifth Avenue South, each from Hudson Street to Ferdinand Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 33751, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
